verses.text: A Jehová co Diosal, yelxo val nivan yelk'ochi, smoj val yalchaj vach' lolonel d'ay d'a yol schonhab', aton tzalan b'aj tz'och ejmelal d'ay.

Manhxo jantacoc svach'il yilji jun tzalan tic, chaanh ayq'uei. A d'a chon tzalan Sion tic, b'aj cajan Dios, a tic ay val stzalajk'olal masanil eb' cajan d'a yolyib'anhq'uinal tic. A Sion tic schonhab' Vinh Rey yelxo val nivan yelk'ochi.
A Dios ayek' d'a juntzanh palacio d'a tzalan Sion tic. Ojtacab'il to a Dios ayoch co columaloc.
Ix smolb'ej sb'a eb' vinh rey, ix cot nhililoc eb' vinh yak' oval d'a chonhab' Sion tic.
Palta ayic ix yilan jun chonhab' tic eb' vinh, ix sat sk'ool eb' vinh. Ix somchajel sk'ool eb' vinh, ix b'at eb' vinh elelal.
Ix yamchaj eb' vinh yuj xivelal, tz'ib'xi eb' vinh yuj yaelal, icha junoc ix ix van yalji yune'.
Icha tz'aj spojb'at te' barco yic chonhab' Tarsis yuj oval ik' scot d'a b'aj sjavi k'u, icha chi' ix aj satel eb' vinh yuj Dios.
A d'a schonhab' Jehová co Diosal Yajal d'a Smasanil, ix quil val yelk'och icha val alb'ilcan d'ayonh. A Dios ol yak'nhej stek'anil Jerusalén.
Ach co Diosal, ayic ayonhek' d'a a templo, sco nacot a nivan vach'k'olal.
Ach co Diosal, te b'inajnac ach d'a smasanil yolyib'anhq'uinal tic, yuj chi' tz'alchaj vach' lolonel d'ayach. Tza b'o yaj masanil tas d'a stojolal yed' a poder.
Ay stzalajk'olal eb' aj Sion. Te tzalajocab' eb' aj Judá yujto d'a stojolal ix a b'o yaj smasanil.
Ek'anhec oyoyoc d'a spatic yichanh Sion, tze b'isani jaye' storreal.
Scham val e sayan eyil smuroal. Schampax eyilan spat eb' yajal, yic vach' ol yal eyalanel yab'ixal d'a eb' unin manto aljoclaj.
A sDiosal Sion, aton co Diosal d'a junelnhej. A tzonh ik'annhej b'eyoc masanto d'a slajvub'.
